info.title: FinancePro API
info.description:
**FinancePro** is a comprehensive personal finance management platform with AI-powered features for transaction classification, budget forecasting, and intelligent financial insights.

## Features
- Multi-account management
- Transaction tracking with AI classification
- Budget planning and monitoring
- AI-powered financial insights
- Advanced analytics and reporting

## Authentication
All endpoints (except `/auth/*`) require Bearer JWT token authentication.

get.description: Health check endpoint
Version information

post.description: Registra nuovo utente e crea profilo finanziario di default

get.description: Ottieni info utente corrente (test endpoint protetto)
Retrieve all financial profiles for the authenticated user

200.description: List of financial profiles retrieved successfully

post.description: Create a new financial profile for the authenticated user

404.description: Default profile not found (data integrity issue)

patch.description: Set the main financial profile for the authenticated user

403.description: Not authorized to set this profile as main

get.description: Retrieve a specific financial profile by its ID

403.description: Not authorized to access this profile

patch.description: Update an existing financial profile (partial update supported)

403.description: Not authorized to update this profile

delete.description: Soft delete a financial profile by setting is_active to False

403.description: Not authorized to delete this profile

get.description: Retrieve all accounts for the authenticated user, filtered by currently selected financial profiles

parameters.name: profile_ids

schema.description: List of currently active financial profile IDs
schema.title: Profile Ids

parameters.description: List of currently active financial profile IDs

post.description: Create a new financial account for the authenticated user

403.description: Not authorized to access this account

delete.description: Delete an account and all its transactions (CASCADE)

get.description: Get current balance for a specific account with metadata
Retrieve all categories for the current user (USER-level, shared across all profiles)

parameters.name: is_active

schema.description: Filter by active status (None = all, True = active only, False = inactive only)
schema.title: Is Active

parameters.description: Filter by active status (None = all, True = active only, False = inactive only)

parameters.name: is_income

schema.description: Filter by category type (None = all, True = income, False = expense)
schema.title: Is Income

parameters.description: Filter by category type (None = all, True = income, False = expense)

post.description: Create a new category for the current user

get.description: Get a specific category by ID
Retrieve transactions with optional filters (profile_id, account_id, category_id, date range)

parameters.name: limit

schema.description: Maximum number of records to return
schema.title: Limit

parameters.description: Maximum number of records to return

get.description: Get spending statistics for transactions (total spent, total income, by category)

bearerAuth.description: JWT token obtained from /api/v1/auth/login endpoint. Token expires after 30 minutes.

tags.name: Health
tags.description: Health check and status endpoints for monitoring

tags.name: Authentication
tags.description: User authentication and authorization endpoints. Includes registration, login, token refresh, and password reset.

tags.name: Financial Profiles
tags.description: Financial profile management. Create and manage personal, family, or business profiles with optional high-security encryption.

tags.name: Accounts
tags.description: Financial accounts management. Create and manage multiple accounts (checking, savings, credit cards, investments) with multi-currency support.

tags.name: Transactions
tags.description: Transaction tracking and management with AI-powered automatic categorization. Supports bulk import from CSV and manual entry.

tags.name: Categories
tags.description: Transaction categories management. Organize transactions with hierarchical categories and custom tags.

tags.name: Budgets
tags.description: Budget planning and monitoring. Create budgets with scope support (user, profile, multi-profile), track spending, and receive alerts.

tags.name: Financial Goals
tags.description: Financial goal management. Set savings goals with milestones, track contributions, and monitor achievement probability.

tags.name: Imports
tags.description: Data import functionality. Import transactions from CSV files with automatic field mapping and duplicate detection.

tags.name: Analysis
tags.description: Financial analysis and reporting. Analyze expenses and income by category, get spending trends, compare budgets vs actual, and multi-profile aggregations.

tags.name: AI Services
tags.description: AI-powered features. Transaction classification, financial forecasting, chat assistant, and spending optimization recommendations.
